Package org.easybatch.extensions.mongodb

This package contains MongoDB support classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MongoDBBatchReader
    Reads MongoDBRecords in batches.
    MongoDBBatchWriter
    Writes a batch of MongoDBRecord to a given collection in bulk mode.
    MongoDBRecord
    Record having a Mongo DBObject as payload .
    MongoDBRecordMapper<T>
    A mapper that maps Mongo DBObject to domain objects using Morphia.
    MongoDBRecordReader
    Reader that reads documents from a MongoDB collection.
    MongoDBRecordWriter
    Writes a Mongo DBObject in a given collection.

Package org.easybatch.extensions.mongodb Description

This package contains MongoDB support classes.
